name: Nasy
bio: I really like to use python to solve things in life, and I also desire to use her extraordinary features. Hope you can enjoy python, too. Besides, I come from China, so if you use Chinese, I can also understand it.

name: Nat Knight
bio: I've used Python professionally and academically for nearly ten year. I like the language for its consistency and its flexibility. I like its community for its emphasis on being approachable.

name: Nicole Montano
bio: I use Python nearly every day and believe everyone can benefit from its simplicity and effectiveness to demonstrate high-level Computer Science concepts and automate everyday tasks.

name: Nauman Shahid
bio: Playing around with Python started out as a hobby, but I have had the opportunity to not only use it academically but also professionally. I have also been appointed as an Academic Mentor for Introduction to Python programming course at the University of Sydney.
